trans-unit.source: Provides enumeration support for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供枚举支持<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: A font family is a set of fonts that have the same typeface, such as Arial, but that differ in features.
trans-unit.target: 字体系列是一套字体具有字体，例如 Arial，相同的但不同功能。

trans-unit.source: These feature differences include <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Style%2A>, such as italic, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Weight%2A>, such as bold.
trans-unit.target: 这些功能差异包括<xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Style%2A>，如斜体，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Weight%2A>，如粗体。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Weight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Fonts](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "Fonts") Example of typefaces that are "Times New Roman" font family members
trans-unit.target: ![字体](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "字体")"Times New Roman"字体系列成员的字体的示例

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects from a string value that represents the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 返回的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>对象从一个字符串值，表示字体的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location that contains the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 包含字体的位置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in location.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>的表示中的字体的对象 location 。

trans-unit.source: The location is .
trans-unit.target: The location is .

trans-unit.source: You cannot pass <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, because this parameter is treated as a path or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 不能将传递<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，因为此参数将被视为路径或[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects from a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value that represents the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 返回的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>对象从[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]值，该值表示字体的位置。

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 基[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的字体的位置的值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in baseUri.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>的表示中的字体的对象 baseUri 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects using a base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value to resolve the font location.
trans-unit.target: 返回的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>对象使用基[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]要解析的字体位置值。

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 基[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的字体的位置的值。

trans-unit.source: The location that contains the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 包含字体的位置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects that represent the fonts in the resolved font location.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>表示的已解析的字体位置中的字体的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects from a string value that represents the font directory location.
trans-unit.target: 返回的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref>对象从一个字符串值，表示字体目录位置。

trans-unit.source: The location that contains the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 包含字体的位置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in location.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>的表示中的字体的对象 location 。

trans-unit.source: The location is .
trans-unit.target: The location is .

trans-unit.source: You cannot pass <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, because this parameter is treated as a path or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 不能将传递<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，因为此参数将被视为路径或[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects from a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value that represents the font location.
trans-unit.target: 返回的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref>对象从[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]表示字体位置的值。

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 基[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的字体的位置的值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in baseUri.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>的表示中的字体的对象 baseUri 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects using a base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value to resolve the font location.
trans-unit.target: 返回的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref>对象使用基[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]要解析的字体位置值。

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 基[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的字体的位置的值。

trans-unit.source: The location that contains the fonts.
trans-unit.target: 包含字体的位置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects that represent the fonts in the resolved font location.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref>表示的已解析的字体位置中的字体的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects from the default system font location.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>从默认系统字体位置的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects that represent the fonts in the system fonts collection.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>表示系统字体集合中的字体的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects from the default system font location.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref>从默认系统字体位置的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects that represent the fonts in the system fonts collection.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref>表示系统字体集合中的字体的对象。
